text.__SUMMARY__: Tillandsia gardneri is a species in the genus Tillandsia. This species is native to Trinidad & Tobago, Colombia, eastern Brazil (as far south as Rio Grande do Sul) and Venezuela.
text.Cultivars:
Tillandsia 'Feather Duster'
Tillandsia 'Gardicta'
Tillandsia 'Quicksilver'
Tillandsia 'Tropic Skye'
